title: Eats items
data:
{{version017}}

Monsters with the '''Eats items''' flag can devour items on the ground that you haven't seen yet. [[Artefact]]s, [[stone]]s, [[large rock]]s, [[rune]]s, and the [[Orb of Zot]] are all immune to this effect.

==History==
Prior to [[0.17]], these monsters could eat any item, whether you'd seen it or not.

Prior to [[0.2]], these monsters could eat artefacts.

[[Category:Monster flags]]
